fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Slippery Peel: Choose a player each night. If they are attacked, the attacker will slip on a banana peel and be role blocked the following night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Slip and Slide: You cannot be detected by investigative roles.
- Banana Split: If you are attacked, you will survive the attack but lose all your abilities for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Banana (Brainless Support) (cont.):
fields.value:
Defense: Basic
Abilities:
- Glitch: Choose a player each night. They will be unable to use their abilities the following night.
- RGB Blast: If you are attacked, you will reflect the attack back to the attacker, killing them.
Attributes:
- During Tuesday and Friday, your Glitch ability will affect two players instead of one.
- Digital Infiltration: You can bypass the protection of a player visited by killing roles.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rot the brains of the Town.
